mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEATS (SEATS_NO, FLIGHT_ID, SEATS_RANK, SEATS_PRICE, SEATS_NUMBER) VALUES (#{seatsNo}, #{flightId}, #{seatsRank}, #{seatsPrice}, #{seatsNumber})
mapper.update: update seats set seats_status='사용' where seats_no = #{seatsNo} and flight_id = #{flightId}
mapper.select: select * from seats order by seats_no asc
SELECT * FROM seats WHERE FLIGHT_ID = #{flightId} ORDER BY SEATS_NUMBER
SELECT * FROM seats WHERE flight_id = #{flightId} ORDER BY seats_no ASC

SELECT s.SEATS_NO, s.SEATS_RANK, s.SEATS_NUMBER, s.SEATS_PRICE, s.SEATS_STATUS, s.FLIGHT_ID, a.AIRLINE_NAME FROM SEATS s JOIN FLIGHT f ON s.FLIGHT_ID = f.FLIGHT_ID JOIN AIRLINE a ON f.USER_ID = a.USER_ID
SELECT * FROM seats WHERE flight_id = #{flightId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT f.flight_id, pd.payment_detail_name, pd.payment_detail_passport, pd.payment_detail_passanger, pd.payment_detail_english, pd.payment_detail_sex, pd.payment_detail_birth, pd.payment_detail_country, pd.payment_detail_visa, pd.payment_detail_expire FROM flight f JOIN payment_detail pd ON f.flight_id = pd.flight_id WHERE f.flight_id = #{flightId} AND pd.payment_detail_status = '승인'

SELECT f.FLIGHT_ID, count(s.seats_no) AS total_seats_no, count(CASE WHEN s.seats_status = '미사용' THEN 1 END) AS unused_seats_count FROM flight f LEFT JOIN seats s ON f.FLIGHT_ID = s.FLIGHT_ID WHERE f.FLIGHT_ID = #{flightId} GROUP BY f.FLIGHT_ID
